abstract: Disney releases free text and audio downloads of story Winnie-the-Pooh and the Royal Birthday, written by Jane Riordan and illustrated by Mark Burgess, to commemorate 90th birthdays of A A Milne's fictional character and Queen Elizabeth II.
lead_paragraph: “Winnie-the-Pooh and the Royal Birthday” was made available for free download, in text and audio format, to celebrate the monarch and the bear turning 90.

headline.main: Winnie-the-Pooh Meets Queen Elizabeth II (and Prince George) in New Release
headline.print_headline: Nonagenarians Unite! Pooh and the Queen

snippet: “Winnie-the-Pooh and the Royal Birthday” was made available for free download, in text and audio format, to celebrate the monarch and the bear turning 90.

keywords.value: Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain
keywords.name: persons
